pathAssistantSteps.info:
*** Do not forget to log all your Emails, Calls, Tasks and Meeting in Salesforce ***

  • Make sure your "Next Step" is updated.
  • Send an "Extended Deck" to the client and follow up, make sure to update "Extended Deck" and "Extended Deck Follow Up" dates
  • Request access to Due Diligence Light and follow up on it for the status of approval, make sure to update "DD Light (Access Granted)" and "DD Light Follow Up" dates
  • Prepare a term sheet and get approval, make sure to update the "Term Sheet Signed" date

*** Do not forget to log all your Emails, Calls, Tasks and Meeting in Salesforce ***

  • Make sure your "Next Step" is updated.
  • ï»¿Request access to Due Diligence Confirmatory and follow up on it for the status of approval, make sure to update "DD Confirmatory (Access Granted)" and "DD Confirmatory Follow Up" dates
  • Prepare question/concerns list and get them rectified, make sure to update "Q&A Answered" date
  • Schedule a meeting with Management and client, make sure to update "Mgmt. Meeting Scheduled" date when the meeting is held

*** Do not forget to log all your Emails, Calls, Tasks and Meeting in Salesforce ***

  • Update the "Close Date" after your first interactions.
  • Make sure your "Next Step" is updated.
  • Update the "Amount" after your first interaction
  • Prepare a Fact Sheet and send to a client, make sure to update "Fact Sheet Sent" and "Fact Sheet Follow Up" dates

*** Do not forget to log all your Emails, Calls, Tasks and Meeting in Salesforce ***

  • Make sure your "Next Step" is updated.
  • If interest prepare shot deck and send to client, make sure to update "Short Deck Sent" date
  • Schedule a "Call/Meeting" with the client. make sure to update the "Scheduled" date
  • Get NDA Signed, make sure to update "NDA Signed" date
  • Send an "Extended Deck" to the client, make sure to update "Extended Deck" sent date

*** Do not forget to log all your Emails, Calls, Tasks and Meeting in Salesforce ***

  • Make sure your "Next Step" is updated.
  • While ISHA Negotiation, make sure to update the "ISHA Negotiation Start Date" date when the negotiation starts
  • During the negotiation of ISHA Terms make sure to update all interactions in salesforce
  • Post negotiation and ISHA is signed make sure to update "ISHA Negotiation Signed Date"

• Make sure your Opportunity Name has a meaningful value.
  • Research Customer/Partner properly before engaging.
  • Enter a reasonable "Close Date" target for this Opportunity.
  • Choose what Finleap Company this Opportunity is for.
  • Prepare a "Use Case Description" for this opportunity.
  • Make sure your "Next Step" is updated.
